```{r}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(mapview)
```

```{r}
egy_sf <- ne_countries(country = 'Egypt', scale = 50)
syr_sf <- ne_countries(country = 'Syria', scale = 50)
```

```{r}
uar_sf <- st_union(egy_sf, syr_sf)
```

```{r}
uar_sf |> st_convex_hull() |> mapview()
```

```{r}
uar_cvx <- uar_sf |> st_convex_hull()
```

```{r}
uar_bbox <- uar_sf |> st_bbox()
```

```{r}
mapview(uar_bbox)
```

```{r}
uar_bbox |> class()
```

```{r}
uar_sf |> st_bbox() |> st_as_sfc() |> st_as_sf(crs = 4326) |> mapview()
```
